author: Silver Cymbal
description:
The MOST common question I get asked is how long a battery power station can run a refrigerator during a power outage? In this video I take a budget minded power station and answer that question and help you be prepared for the next storm.

Mango E Power Station: https://bit.ly/49xp4s3
Limited time its 60% off, this is NOT an affiliate link. 

It is for sale on Amazon but at full price https://amzn.to/49dl0vX

Mango provided me with this unit for review & testing. Instead of doing a normal review I opted to just do a single test to see how it would perform. see the results and my opinions of this unit in the video.

title: How Long Can a Battery Run Your Fridge During a Power Outage? Testing a Mango
